title: Curtain from the Prindle House, one of a pair
description: pair of curtains, lilypad motif in green and yellow on red ground painted on fabric of linen warp and gold metallic wrapped weft; backed with velvet. H. 87 in., W.48 in. From the Prindle House, Duluth, MN.
creditline: Gift of funds from Wheaton Wood, by exchange
